Translations.Text: Vi vojagx ne scribe est available obligaci posxt garanti repayment! Unu fid en this manier li return obligaci when due li observ DI his Lord Ne withhold any testimony per concealing ki vi witnessed Anyone withholds testimony est sinful je kor DI EST fully aware da CXIO VI do
Al DI aparten cxio heavens ter! Whether vi deklar your innermost thoughts keep them fel DI ten vi responsible por them. Li forgives whomever Li vol pun whomever Li vol! DI est Omnipotent

messenger hav kred en ki send down him his Lord kaj tial did believers! Ili kred en DI His angxel His scripture His messengers Ni ne far distinction any da His messengers Ili dir Ni auxd ni obe. Forgive us our Lord Al Vi est ultimate destiny

DI NENIAM SXARGX ANIM its means its KREDIT est KI gxi earns KONTRAUX est KI GXI commits Our Lord ne kondamn us ni forges far mistakes Our Lord protekt us el blaspheming Vi like those antaux us done Our Lord protekt us el pek gxi igx tro late us pent! Pardon us forgive us! Vi est our Lord Mastr Grant us victory disbelieving popol
